special_abilities.name: Charge.
descriptions: If the rothe moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
descriptions: The deep rothe's spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast dancing lights at will, requiring no components.

actions.name: Gore.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage.
